entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few wet flurries and rain showers changing to a few rain showers this morning. Snow level rising to 1000 metres this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of wet flurries or rain showers near midnight. Snow level near valley bottom. Fog patches developing this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 16 January 2023
